author: TechHut
description: In this stream we will cover a few different topics. First we will take a look at the pearOS Caralina release, then we get into some awesome Linux news! Inclusing the new Valve device, JingPads, and Office 365 coming to Linux! https://www.omgubuntu.co.uk/2021/07/steam-deck-handheld-linux-pc https://jingpad.com/ https://www.zdnet.com/article/microsoft-just-blew-up-the-only-reason-you-cant-use-a-linux-desktop/
title: 50,000 SUB STREAM ~ Steam Deck uses Arch btw, JingPad Update, pearOS and MORE!
